application.doc: Retrieving the contents of a directory from the application log files area

param.name: file_path
param.doc: The relative path of the file to be retrieved.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the contents of a directory from the application log files area
method.doc: To retrieve the contents of a directory from the application log files area with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the application log files area resource URI.

request.doc:
Retrieve the contents of a directory non-recursively
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/
Retrieve the contents of a sub directory
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/{file_path}/
Retrieve the contents of a directory or a sub directory recursively
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/?recursive=yes
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/{file_path}/?recursive=yes
Retrieve the contents of a directory or a sub directory recursively and flatten the output with more detail
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/?recursive=yes&flat_details=yes
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/application_logs/{file_path}/{file_path}/?recursive=yes&flat_details=yes

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: type
param.doc: Resource type. Valid values are "file" and "directory".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of the file. This is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).
